duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, schedule, coordinate, and manage projects involving the construction of ISP and OSP facilities and oversee the construction process from conceptualization to completion.
Monitor and manage quality and completion of work and resolve issues, accurately reporting on the progress of a project and updates databases as applicable.
Perform aerial and underground inspections, audits of contractors, and the development, trials, and implementation of new processes and field software.
Assign and dispatch work to contract inspectors and perform training of contract personnel in aerial plant inspection and correction methods.
Work with other team members to assure timely completion, quality work, and safe working practices throughout the labor and billing cycle.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree or equivalent education and experience or 2-3 years with a Master's Degree
